name: SHOTDOWN
description:
Welcome to the Possum Corporations' Operation SHOTDOWN webpage. We would like to give you an introduction, and context to the creation of this project.

The Possum Corps Medical Sciences Headquarters located in [REDACTED] held a powerful biological agent created within the test chambers. Its aim was to drastically enhance and boost the human condition for optimal evolution.

Things went wrong and stuff and oh snap Mr. Scientist slipped and the thing went into the local water supply! everyone in america a zombie now!!!

The Possum Corps' 7 Sigma Wardens have been sent to the area to inspect and investigate the damage caused by the agent.


For the next phase of the Operation, we plan on doing the following:

  • Add more weapons to the current roster
  • Add more areas of operation (maps)
  • Add more character customization options
  • Add achievements

  Friend says: "Remember! This game is a work in progress, any suggestions and feedback is always appreciated!"
